Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: goowin
Reviews.Content: okay 4 star hotel expect low cost close london stayed night spent day london looking sleep bedroom clean bed comfy cover little short bathroom clean plug didnt fit sink breakfast parking real bonus allowed car days london easy london 10 min walk station fine worth money

Reviews.Title: “A very, very basic hotel.”
Reviews.Author: ATJLancsUK
Reviews.Content: stayed twin bed top house head restricted clean bathroom refurbished bath seen wasnt shower stayed nights change towels bed linen werent informed furniture consisted single beds bedside cabinet builtin wardrobe unpainted mdf inviting carpets stairs threadbare thick dust door frames finger marks door handles throughout hotel breakfast average minimal choice stayed similar price nearby inn mistake

Reviews.Title: “great value and great service, what more do you need?”
Reviews.Author: thedjs
Reviews.Content: family london usual sights value hotel close underground grove hill fitted bill perfectly maximum 10 minute walk tube south quad 2 double beds cleaned daily breakfast fruit juice coffeetea choice cereals lots toast cooked breakfast cant moan facilities value london staff lovely feel welcome budget stay london thank hotel stay
